{{cpp/title|wmemchr}}
{{cpp/string/wide/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|cwchar}}
{{dcl|num=1|
const wchar_t* wmemchr( const wchar_t* ptr, wchar_t ch, std::size_t count );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|
      wchar_t* wmemchr(       wchar_t* ptr, wchar_t ch, std::size_t count );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Locates the first occurrence of wide character {{c|ch}} in the initial {{c|count}} wide characters of the wide character array pointed to by {{c|ptr}}. 

If {{c|count}} is zero, the function returns a null pointer.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ptr|pointer to the wide character array to be examined}}
{{par|ch|wide character to search for}}
{{par|count|number of wide characters to examine}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Pointer to the location of the wide character, or a null pointer if no such character is found.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;clocale&gt;
#include &lt;cwchar&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;locale&gt;

int main()
{
    const wchar_t str[] = L"诺不轻信，故人不负我\0诺不轻许，故我不负人。";
    wchar_t target = L'许';
    const std::size_t sz = sizeof str / sizeof *str;
    if (const wchar_t* result = std::wmemchr(str, target, sz))
    {
        std::setlocale(LC_ALL, "en_US.utf8");
        std::wcout.imbue(std::locale("en_US.utf8"));
        std::wcout &lt;&lt; "Found '" &lt;&lt; target &lt;&lt; "' at position " &lt;&lt; result - str &lt;&lt; '\n';
    }
}
|p=true
|output=
Found '许' at position 14
}}
